title: State v. Pamela Lanier – Addendum 2 – Embedded Justice
itunes:subtitle: May 3, 2018 / Rebecca Lavoie hosts this addendum with Susan, Colin, and Madeleine Baran, for a discussion on Episode 2 of the Pam Lanier case, updates in the Joey Watkins case, and the recently released Season 2 of Madeleine's podcast "In the Dark," on...
content:encoded:
May 3, 2018 / Rebecca Lavoie hosts this addendum with Susan, Colin, and Madeleine Baran, for a discussion on Episode 2 of the Pam Lanier case, updates in the Joey Watkins case, and the recently released Season 2 of Madeleine's podcast "In the Dark," on the Curtis Flowers case in Winona, Mississippi.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by The Economist.

www.Economist.com/Undisclosed

#undisclosed #udaddendum
